title: K-12 Web-Based E-Learning Design for Simplifying Complex Science Topics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and specialized terminology
context.additional_context: Utilizing web-based educational materials that simplify complex scientific concepts in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain complex scientific concepts using a hierarchical structure of three or more levels.
Learners can summarize core theories with over 80% accuracy using web-based e-learning tools
Knowledge application skills improved by 70% through mobile-optimized interactive learning materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
